stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the impact of the wars of the French Revolution and of Napoleon on Europe?

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of crisis, upheaval, and revolution in the eighteenth century.

choicesHtml: The wars led to the spread of nationalist and liberal thought across Europe.
The wars failed to change the status quo of the European political order.
The wars transformed many European countries into liberal democracies.
The wars established France as the dominant power in Europe.
